document.full_text: the supreme court on tuesday questioned whether a global warming lawsuit against five big power companies can proceed, with several justices saying the environmental protection agency, not federal judges, should deal with the issue.
document.title: supreme court questions global warming lawsuit
lines_and_colors: the supreme court on tuesday questioned whether a global warming lawsuit against five big power companies can proceed, with several justices saying the environmental protection agency, not federal judges, should deal with the issue.
